Package Model.Cineplex

Class SeatFormat

java.lang.Object
Model.Cineplex.SeatFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SeatFormat extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents the seating format for a cinema
See Also:

    SeatFormat(int lformatWidth, int aisleCount, SeatRowType[] rowsComposition)
    Create a seating format based on the width of the Cinema and the ordered composition of the seat rows

  • Constructor Details

    • SeatFormat

      public SeatFormat(int lformatWidth, int aisleCount, SeatRowType[] rowsComposition)
      Create a seating format based on the width of the Cinema and the ordered composition of the seat rows
      Parameters:
      lformatWidth - the width of the Cinema
      rowsComposition - the composition of seat row types stored as an array Rows starting from the entrance begins as the first element of the array

    • getCapacityByType

      public static Hashtable<String,Integer> getCapacityByType(SeatFormat seatformat)
      Gets the number of each seat type in the seating format
      Parameters:
      seatformat - the seating format to count the number of each seat type
      Returns:
      A Hashtable of count for each seat type in the seating format

    • getCapacity

      public static int getCapacity(SeatFormat seatformat)
      Gets the total number of seats in the seating lformat
      Parameters:
      seatformat - The seating format to count the total number of seats
      Returns:
      Total number of seats

    • getformat

      public Hashtable<Integer,SeatRow> getformat()

      Returns:
      seating format

    • printformat

      public static void printformat(SeatFormat seatformat)
      Print the seating format, stored in a Hashtable, for debugging purposes. Prints the rows starting from the screen
      Parameters:
      seatformat - the format object with the seating format to be printed

    • setformat

      public void setformat(Hashtable<Integer,SeatRow> newformat)
      Get the seating format, stored in a Hashtable
      Parameters:
      newformat - the new format to replace
